pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, December 14, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks in the House of Commons as part of a tribute to the Honourable Jim Carr.

7:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus holiday party, and will deliver remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
